Which sentence shows parallel structure?
My job includes checking the inventory, initialing the orders, and to call the suppliers. false
The game-show contestant was told to be cheerful, charming, and with enthusiasm. false
Grandmother likes to read mystery novels, to do needlepoint, and surfing the Internet. false
We painted the trim in the living room; the wallpaper was put up by a professional. false
Many people share the same three intense fears: being in high places, working with numbers, and giving speeches. true
